verses.verse: The former <S%G3303><s%> <S%G4413><s%> treatise <S%G3056><s%> have I made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5668><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> Theophilus <S%G2321><s%>, of <S%G4012><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> <S%G5662><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5721><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5721><s%>,

Until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> he was taken up <S%G353><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, after that he through <S%G1223><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> had given Mitzvot <S%G1781><s%> <S%G5674><s%> unto the emissarys <S%G652><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he had chosen <S%G1586><s%> <S%G5668><s%>:

To whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he shewed <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5656><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> his <S%G846><s%> passion <S%G3958><s%> <S%G5629><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> infallible proofs <S%G5039><s%>, being seen <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5740><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> <S%G1223><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> speaking <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of the things pertaining <S%G4012><s%> to the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%>, being assembled together <S%G4871><s%> <S%G5740><s%> with <S%G846><s%> them, commanded <S%G3853><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%> that they should <S%G5563><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> depart <S%G5563><s%> <S%G5745><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2414><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> wait <S%G4037><s%> <S%G5721><s%> for the promise <S%G1860><s%> of the Father <S%G3962><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%>, saith he, ye have heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of me <S%G3450><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with water <S%G5204><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> shall be immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5701><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> many <S%G3326><s%> <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> hence <S%G5025><s%>.

When <S%G3303><s%> they therefore <S%G3767><s%> were come together <S%G4905><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, they asked <S%G1905><s%> <S%G5707><s%> of him <S%G846><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, <S%G1487><s%> wilt thou <S%G600><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> restore again <S%G600><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> to Yisra'EL <S%G2474><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> for you <S%G5216><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5629><s%> the times <S%G5550><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the seasons <S%G2540><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> hath put <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5639><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> power <S%G1849><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> ye shall receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5695><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, after that the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> is come <S%G1904><s%> <S%G5631><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> ye shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> witnesses <S%G3144><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in SHomron <S%G4540><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> the uttermost part <S%G2078><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he had spoken <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5631><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, while they <S%G846><s%> beheld <S%G991><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, he was taken up <S%G1869><s%> <S%G5681><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> a cloud <S%G3507><s%> received <S%G5274><s%> <S%G5627><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sight <S%G3788><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> while <S%G5613><s%> they looked stedfastly <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G816><s%> <S%G5723><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> went up <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, two <S%G1417><s%> men <S%G435><s%> stood by <S%G3936><s%> <S%G5715><s%> them <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> apparel <S%G2066><s%>;

Which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Ye men <S%G435><s%> of the Galil <S%G1057><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> stand ye <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5758><s%> gazing up <S%G1689><s%> <S%G5723><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>? this same <S%G3778><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> is taken up <S%G353><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G575><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, shall <S%G2064><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5695><s%> in like manner as <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> ye have seen <S%G2300><s%> <S%G5662><s%> him <S%G846><s%> go <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5740><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> returned they <S%G5290><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Olivet <S%G1638><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> from <S%G1451><s%> Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%> a sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day's journey <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> <S%G3598><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they were come in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, they went up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5627><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> an upper room <S%G5253><s%>, where <S%G3757><s%> abode <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G2650><s%> <S%G5723><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Ya`akov <S%G2385><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Andrew <S%G406><s%>, Philip <S%G5376><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Thomas <S%G2381><s%>, Bar-Talmai <S%G918><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Mattit-yahu <S%G3156><s%>, Ya`akov <S%G2385><s%> the son of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> SHim`on <S%G4613><s%> Zelotes <S%G2208><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> the brother of Ya`akov <S%G2385><s%>.

These <S%G3778><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> continued <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> <S%G4342><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with one accord <S%G3661><s%> in prayer <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> supplication <S%G1162><s%>, with <S%G4862><s%> the women <S%G1135><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Miryam <S%G3137><s%> the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G5025><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> stood up <S%G450><s%> <S%G5631><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, <S%G5037><s%> (the number <S%G3793><s%> of names <S%G3686><s%> together <S%G1909><s%> <S%G846><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%>,)

Men <S%G435><s%> and brethren <S%G80><s%>, this <S%G5026><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5713><s%> needs have been fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5683><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> spake before <S%G4277><s%> <S%G5627><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> guide <S%G3595><s%> to them that took <S%G4815><s%> <S%G5631><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> numbered <S%G2674><s%> <S%G5772><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had obtained <S%G2975><s%> <S%G5627><s%> part <S%G2819><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%>.

Now <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> this man <S%G3778><s%> purchased <S%G2932><s%> <S%G5662><s%> a field <S%G5564><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> the reward <S%G3408><s%> of iniquity <S%G93><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> falling <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> headlong <S%G4248><s%>, he burst asunder <S%G2997><s%> <S%G5656><s%> in the midst <S%G3319><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bowels <S%G4698><s%> gushed out <S%G1632><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> unto all <S%G3956><s%> the dwellers <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5723><s%> at Yerushalayim <S%G2419><s%>; insomuch as <S%G5620><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> field <S%G5564><s%> is called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5683><s%> in their <S%G846><s%> proper <S%G2398><s%> tongue <S%G1258><s%>, Hakal-D'ma <S%G184><s%>, that is to say <S%G5123><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, The field <S%G5564><s%> of blood <S%G129><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of Psalms <S%G5568><s%>, Let <S%G1096><s%> his <S%G846><s%> habitation <S%G1886><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5676><s%> desolate <S%G2048><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G2077><s%> <S%G5749><s%> no man <S%G3361><s%> dwell <S%G2730><s%> <S%G5723><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bishoprick <S%G1984><s%> let <S%G2983><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5630><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G3767><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> men <S%G435><s%> which have companied <S%G4905><s%> <S%G5631><s%> with us <S%G2254><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> that <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> in <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5627><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> among <S%G1909><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>,

Beginning <S%G756><s%> <S%G5671><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the immersion <S%G908><s%> of Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>, unto <S%G2193><s%> that same day <S%G2250><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> he was taken up <S%G353><s%> <S%G5681><s%> from <S%G575><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> be ordained <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5635><s%> to be a witness <S%G3144><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> resurrection <S%G386><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they appointed <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5627><s%> two <S%G1417><s%>, Yosef <S%G2501><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Barsabas <S%G923><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> was surnamed <S%G1941><s%> <S%G5681><s%> Justus <S%G2459><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Mattit-yahu <S%G3159><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they prayed <S%G4336><s%> <S%G5666><s%>, and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, Thou <S%G4771><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%>, which knowest the hearts <S%G2589><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men, shew <S%G322><s%> <S%G5657><s%> whether <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> thou hast chosen <S%G1586><s%> <S%G5668><s%>,

That he may take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5629><s%> part <S%G2819><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> ministry <S%G1248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> emissaryship <S%G651><s%>, from <S%G1537><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> by transgression fell <S%G3845><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, that he might go <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5677><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they gave forth <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5656><s%> their <S%G846><s%> lots <S%G2819><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the lot <S%G2819><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> Mattit-yahu <S%G3159><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he was numbered <S%G4785><s%> <S%G5681><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the eleven <S%G1733><s%> emissarys <S%G652><s%>.
